nodes.text: Personal Combat Shields were plasma shields that could be activated from the Mandalorian vambraces worn by the Mandalorian warriors. The shields could deflect blaster fire and were 50 centimeters in circumference.

The members of the Mandalorian splinter group Death Watch were known to employ Personal Combat Shields in their gauntlets. They were used to deflect blaster bolts from Maul's Mandalorian super commandos during the Mandalorian civil war, after Bo-Katan Kryze's troops found themselves cornered without cover. The vambraces gifted to Sabine Wren by Fenn Rau also were equipped with a Personal Combat Shield. Sabine used in battle with Gar Saxon outside the Wren Stronghold on Krownest.
Markona had such, which could be projected from his gauntlet and could deflect a lightsaber.
